revision.text:
{{Wired embedded system |brand=UDOO |model=NEO |revision=Basic |price=35 |is_manuf=No |manuf=SECO |est_release_date=09/2015 |type=single-board computer |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=2 |pwr_conn=barrel |pwr_barrel_outer=5.5 |pwr_barrel_inner=2.1 |cpu1_brand=Freescale (NXP) |cpu1_model=i.MX6SX;MCIMX6X, 4EVM10AB; |cpu1_cspeed=1 GHz |fla1=0 |ram1=512 |ram1_brand=Micron |ram1_model=MT41K128M16JT-125 |ram1_num=2 |expansion_if_types=USB 2.0, |expansion_usb_num=2 |jtag=yes,, 14-pad header,, J11 |serial=yes,, 3.3V TTL,, (115200 8N1) |eth_cpu=true |eth_chip2_brand=Microchip |eth_chip2_model=KSZ8091 |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=1 |addl_chips=PMIC;NXP;MC32PF3000;;1; ,,, Low-Power 3D HDMI Transmitter;NXP;TDA19988BHN;;1; ,,, 0.5A Dual Channel Power Switch;Diodes Inc;AP2152A;;1; ,,, 340kHz, 3A Synchronous DC-DC Buck Converter;BCD Semi;AP3503F;;2; ,,, Triple 2-Channel Analog Multiplexer/Demultiplexer;Toshiba; 74VHC4053AFT;;2; |flags=Micro SD Card slot, Micro HDMI, RTC w/ battery, LVDS, SPDIF, CAN Bus, GPIO, I2C, I2S, SPI |stock_boot=U-Boot; |stock_os=Linux;3.14.56;Ubuntu 14.04; |tp_firmware=Android 6.0, Armbian (unofficial), |default_ip=acquired via DHCP |default_user=udooer |default_pass=udooer }} {{TagLine|UDOO Neo}} :[https://www.udoo.org/udoo-neo/ Product page]
"www.udoo.org", "CSA69REVD" and "BD REVD" are silkscreened on bottom of board.
*[https://www.udoo.org/docs-neo/Introduction/Introduction.html ''UDOO Neo Documentation'' on '''UDOO.org''' Docs] *[https://www.kickstarter.com/projects/udoo/udoo-neo-raspberry-pi-arduino-wi-fi-bt-40-sensors ''UDOO Neo = Raspberry Pi + Arduino + Wi-Fi + BT 4.0 + Sensors'' on '''Kickstarter'''] *[https://www.cnx-software.com/2015/02/25/udoo-neo-development-board-is-powered-by-freescale-i-mx-6solox-processor/ ''UDOO Neo Development Board'' on '''CNX|Software''']
{{See also|List of Single-board computers}}
===Hardware specification=== *CPU: ''[[NXP]]'' i.MX6 ''SoloX'' (MCIMX6X4EVM10AB) :[[ARM]] Cortex-A9 @1GHz + Cortex-M4 @200MHz *GPU: ''Vivante'' GC420 *Memory: 512MB (SDRAM) DDR3 *Onboard Storage: TF card (max.64GB)/MMC card slot *Ports: 1x FE LAN, 1x USB 2.0, 1x USB (OTG)
===See also=== *[[UDOO Dual]] *[[UDOO Quad]] *[[UDOO NEO Basic]] *[[UDOO NEO Full]]
